name: Cute Teddy Bear
description: A soft, cuddly bear perfect for beginners.

steps.detail: Wrap the yarn around your finger twice and secure with a chain.
Insert hook into the ring, pull up a loop, yarn over and pull through.
Do two single crochets in every stitch around the circle.

name: Sunflower Purse
description: A stylish boho purse with a sunflower motif.

steps.detail: Create a slip knot and chain 20 to start the base.
Work one double crochet into each chain stitch.

name: Curtain Bunny
description: A cute bunny that hugs your curtains.

steps.detail: Start with the long ears using simple chains.
